alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Marshall (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:47AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marshall and southwestern DeKalb Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 947 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Albertville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albertville, Guntersville, Crossville, Geraldine, Lakeview, McVille, Dog Town, Hopewell, Skirum and Lake Guntersville St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
